DescriptionData.Title: 100m Gutermann Sew-all Thread 000 Black
DescriptionData.Description:
Buy 3 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size (any colour) and save 5%!

Buy 10 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size  (any colour) and save 10%!

Discount applied in your basket


Gutermann Sew-all thread is the most reliable of machine threads. It may be used on natural, blended and synthetic fabrics which makes it extremely versatile.

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Patch Tapestry Starter Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
DMC have put together a fun starter kit for tapestry. You can make yourself a 15cm square tapestry of a orange monster.
This kit contains: > Printed Canvas > DMC soft cotton thread > Tapestry needle > Easy to follow instructions
FINISHED SIZE: 15cm square (6")
DIFFICULTY: perfect for children, due to the sharp needle and the small parts it is not recommended for children under 3.

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Hoop It Owls - Embroidery Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
DMC have put together a fun embroidery kit. You can make yourself a personalised embroidery loop.
This kit contains: > White flexible embroidery hoop - 15cm > Printed cotton poplin fabric x 2 > 8cm square of handicraft felt > Carioca felt tip pen > Needle > DMC stranded cotton threads x 2 > DMC Light Effects thread > DMC Colour Variation thread > Fillawant Gingham check ribbon 30cm > Instructions > Hints and tips with templates
Designed for children 6+, it will make an ideal gift.

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Santa With Sleigh Counted Cross Stitch Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
DMC have put together a pretty cross stitch kit. You can make yourself a 15cm x 15cm a lovely Christmas Scene.
This kit contains: > 14 count Aida Fabric > DMC cotton threads > Cross stitch needle > Easy to follow instructions
FINISHED SIZE: 15cm x 15cm (6" x 6"),
DIFFICULTY: Moderate

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Snowman With Presents Counted Cross Stitch Kit
DescriptionData.Description:

DescriptionData.Title: DMC The Snowman Snowdog Bookmark Cross Stitch Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
Embroider this wonderful bookmark from the film "The Snowman"
This counted cross-stitch kit contains: > 16-count antique white aida fabric > embroidery thread > needle > Chart > Instructions
STITCHES: full cross-stitch
FINISHED SIZE: approx 2" x 6.5" (5 x 17cm)
DIFFICULTY: perfect for newbies
